attributes.action: implement a teenage curfew for under 17's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
youngsters under the age of 17,congregating on street corners and outside shops,cause misery towards people visiting the shops,and going about the daily buisness.
many oap's wont venture out due to this and unless these kids have something to do,the government ought to implement a curfew after 9pm to all teenagers who are stood around,doing nothing,but causing nuisance
